core.functional module

core.functional.compose_model_kwargs(default_model_kwargs: Dict, model_kwargs: Dict) → Dict[source]

The model configuration exclude the input itself. Combine the default model, model_kwargs with the passed model_kwargs. Example: model_kwargs = {“temperature”: 0.5, “model”: “gpt-3.5-turbo”} self.model_kwargs = {“model”: “gpt-3.5”} combine_kwargs(model_kwargs) => {“temperature”: 0.5, “model”: “gpt-3.5-turbo”}
